recipe:
Tuna Rice Bake FODMAP friendly
1 can creamed corn 2 cups cooked rice 1/4 cup boiling water 1 teaspoon curry powder 1-2 chicken stock cubes 1/2 bunch parsley chopped 1 425 gms tuna in olive oil drained Grated tasty cheese SandP to taste
Put curry powder and stock cubes in boiling water and stir until dissolved. Place all ingredients in a baking dish except cheese and stir to combine then smooth top. Cover with grated cheese and place in preheated moderate (180D) oven for 20-30 minutes. Serve with salad if desired. Quick and super easy!
